events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for days, and I'm worried about the delay.
Tagging this case as Delivery Delay based on customer's report of late shipping and stagnant tracking updates.
Assigning case to support agent Jessica T. to handle the delivery delay inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your package hasn't arrived yet. I'll do my best to help you find out what's going on.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address to help us track your package more efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 789 Oak Street, Springfield, IL 62704.
Thank you for the info. I've contacted the courier service and found a delay due to weather conditions. They expect to deliver your package within the next 3 days.
I appreciate the update. Although Iâ€™m disappointed it will take longer, I understand the situation with the weather delays.
Your package has now been delivered according to the courier confirmation. Please check the delivery location at your earliest convenience.
Just following up to ensure you received your package and everything is in order. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing this case now that the delivery issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
